我想再提供一個今天隨機遇到的例子
https://www.forbes.com/sites/williampesek/2020/05/01/china-spends-600-billion-to-trump-americas-economy/
文章言之鑿鑿：
This was the week, after all, when Chinese President Xi Jinping tossed another 4 trillion yuan, or $565 billion, at an economy taking devastating coronavirus blows.
......
Now, as Xi’s Communist Party pulls a similar play, it’s hard not to lament this week’s missteps in Mitch McConnell’s Washington.

是因為我沒有關注中國新聞嗎，一度我以為這是大新聞
我搜索了一下，貌似一個月以前有個新“34萬億”，然而此文的4 trillion是怎麼回事？
此文鏈接了友刊文章：https://www.bloombergquint.com/global-economics/china-s-600-billion-bet-to-revive-growth-with-infrastructure

原來，這隻是經濟學家和分析師們的預測。。。而且是以政府債券的形式。。
似是而非甚至是碰瓷借題發揮，是不是有點太balant
